description:
These four sisters are granddaughters of Atou Saizo. Their voices were sampled into Juiz voice, and they are also involved in the management of Selecao game.
They consist of:
Akane (アカネ) the first daughter. She has studied musical abroad at Broadway.
Fumie (フミエ) the second daughter. Former library staff member.
Yuuko (ユーコ) the third daughter. Former staff member in school where English is spoken. She is also the lady at the reception desk at ATO Harima Brain Science Institute.
Akiko (アキコ) the fourth daughter. Former announcer.
They are all voiced by http://anidb.net/cr471 [Tamagawa Sakiko].
name: Atou Ke Yon Shimai
